metadata.title: CVE-2018-18408 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free was discovered in the tcpbridge binary of Tcpreplay 4.3.0beta1. The issue gets triggered in the function post_args() at tcpbridge.c,causing a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1build1').
